Addon.name: Money+ Add-on V1.1.3
Addon.role: This add-on adds currencies like the Euros and the dollars ($) to your world.

Addon.name: MineMoney Add-on - Adds Money!
Addon.role: The MineMoney add-on adds Minecraft-store inspired currency to your Survival or Roleplay worlds! With six new money items, eight new blocks, new mobs, more chest loot, etc.

Addon.name: Money Mod
Addon.role: If you have ever wanted to add money to your world this is the mod for you. This mod adds new items to the game which you can use as money.

Addon.name: Merchants Sellers
Addon.role: Merchants Sellers es un addon de comerciante donde podemos comprar cosas a cambio de bolsas de dinero (que seria un articulo que agrega el addon), ademas, cada comerciante tiene un oficio respectivo como: comida, cosechas, armaduras, etc.

Addon.name: Super Currency Money Addon
Addon.role: Well so im SqLoSt from team SQcoding , lemme explain our addon to you : i was alone sitting in my room and playing Minecraft then throught? Why there is no Currency expect of golds and irons? Then Started a New project named Super Currency WTH :dolars , Euros , Ruble and Turkish Lira .

Addon.name: NPC Traders
Addon.role: This addon is all about exchanging things through money and you can buy many things; from armor, food, animals, villagers, blocks, and in addition to that it adds missions that by giving some things gives you money to continue buying more things.

Addon.name: Money Addon v3.1.5 | Currency | Economy
Addon.role: Hello Everybody! Welcome to my addon. This is an update of my previous addon. What's New? Glad you asked let's get started.

Addon.name: Smartphone Add-on V2.1! (Only for 1.19)
Addon.role: Change the weather, day, night, play music and apply effects to improve your game and have fun with your friends! An add-on made for you and your friends to have fun, maybe even troll each other!

Addon.name: Anti Grief & Auto Scoreboard Currency Generator
Addon.role: V5 | 12/16/20 | This addon will automatically make a money scoreboard, prevent griefing by replacing lava with either dirt or air, kills ender dragons, crystals, tnt and automatically bans anyone near a command block summoning a ender dragon or crystal. NO LAG!!!

Addon.name: IndoCash V1.2
Addon.role: Are you wanted to having money into your Minecraft? Or you love your Indonesian country? Or you are Asean people who like Indonesia? Or you are Indonesian people? This AddOn is Perfect for you!!

Addon.name: Advanced Minecraft Currency Addon (Obtainable in Survival Worlds)
Addon.role: We all know that trading is a common event in Minecraft. Whether you're with friends or villagers, foes or communities, once you surpass the basic neanderthal way of playing, (moving out of the wooden age), you will most likely be starting to trade and commerce with your peers.

Addon.name: MineMoney Add-on - Adds Money!
Addon.role: The MineMoney add-on adds Minecraft-store inspired currency to your Survival or Roleplay worlds! With six new money items, eight new blocks, new mobs, more chest loot, etc. you can trade with other players or horde your riches in a vault until your heart's content.

Addon.name: Legendary's Food Balanced Add-on
Addon.role: This will turn most foods and ones i use the most into more useful foods (Saturation and hunger restoration have been changed to accommodate the changes within the food)

Addon.name: Heisei Godzilla Addon
Addon.role: The king of the monsters is here! now get these kaiju on Minecraft! He can destroy buildings also he can use his atomic breath! He's massive He is Super Bad! now destroy every building with these kaiju He will be a king every day!

Addon.name: The Dawn Of Godzilla
Addon.role: Godzilla is one of the most iconic modded mobs in Minecraft JAVA, So how about some of that in Minecraft Bedrock? Well this addon has its own take on our favourite dragon like titan!

Addon.name: Godzilla vs Kong Addon BEH
Addon.role: GODZILLA vs KONG is now available on MCPEDL. Witness the two Titans battling each other in your world. Don't forget the other Titans Which of them are good and which of them is bad.

Addon.name: Godzilla vs Kong Addon RES
Addon.role: GODZILLA vs KONG is now available on MCPEDL. Witness the two Titans battling each other in your world. Don't forget the other Titans Which of them are good and which of them is bad.

Note: This addon is available only on MCPEDL, no more websites or app that can publish my addon without the owners permission.

Addon.role: Godzilla and giant monsters are awesome, nuff said. In this addon there will be monsters from the Godzilla series and maybe other universes, updates are hopefully to come, and I hope you guys like it. Also, thanks to SpringyMC for teaching me how to make custom entities.

Addon.name: Godzilla KOTM Add-on (Fixed The Huge Creeper)
Addon.role: The Godzilla KOTM Add-on adds 10 huge monsters from the Godzilla KOTM movie with dramatic sounds. It's really a must-play if you like Godzilla and want to experience his wrath in Minecraft!

Addon.name: Godzilla Legacy
Addon.role: Have you wanted to see Godzilla and all his enemies and allies in Minecraft? If you do, then your wish came true. This addon adds most of the mobs in Godzilla Kotm.

Addon.name: Shin Godzilla Add-on BEH
Addon.role: Shin godzilla will roam on your world just ignore him but if you want to fight him....... Well idk is that the right idea. Let's not forget his evolution. From shark to giant monster.

Addon.name: Shin Godzilla Add-on RES
Addon.role: Shin godzilla will roam on your world just ignore him but if you want to fight him....... Well idk is that the right idea. Let's not forget his evolution. From shark to giant monster.

Addon.name: Kong Addon RES
Addon.role: If you have other Godzilla add-on this add-on is perfect to fight him. I added awesome kongs that can be perfect for big fight.

Addon.name: Godzilla Monsterverse DEMO
Addon.role: Adding one of the most popular kaiju movies monsters the Godzilla from the Legendary Monsterverse franchise, including his power, sounds and abilities from the movie, with the same experience as we seen in the movie!!!

Addon.name: PREHISTORICA BETA
Addon.role: Have you dreamed to make your own prehistoric zoo in Minecraft? Well, this addon will help you. PREHISTORICA is a dinosaurs addon that add scientifically accurate dinosaurs into your world!

Addon.name: More Biomes Plus (Discontinued)
Addon.role: This is my addon more biomes Plus because less biomes minus wasn't enough (cricket cricket cricket) anywho this addon features 2 biomes and 2 disasters biomes and 3 new mobs for now

Addon.name: Yamaha RX115
Addon.role: Here's a project I wanted to do for awhile now. The car's 2 wheeled-cousin, motorcycles! Introducing the Yamaha RX115, a motorcycle that may not be famous or even known in most parts of the world, but used to rule the roads of countries like Pakistan, Uruguay and Southeast Asian countries back in the 1980's. Affordable, strong, reliable, fast; key characteristics that made this bike popular amongst the youth community of these countries.

Addon.name: BikeCraft Add-On
Addon.role: What if we have a option to find materials, craft and use Motorcycles in Minecraft? With this add-on you can do this. Craft awesome motorcycles and have fun with your friends (Or, maybe... your pig).

Addon.name: Moto Mod/Addon
Addon.role: MOTO MOD/ADDON is a mod that adds 2 mobs into the game, and can transform into a motorcycle or a cyborg, and you can download it on a mediafire link!

Addon.name: Ossa 250 Tracker

So about the add-on the Ossa 250 Tracker, Ossa was a Spanish motorcycle manufacturer which was active from 1924 to 1982 and from 2010 to 2015.

Addon.name: Loginicum: All Mods and Animations (Release of Project {Aliens})
Addon.role: Hello! This is the general page of all my mods. Here will be all my mods, as well as textures with animations.

Addon.name: Honda BeAT Motorcycle
Addon.role: A scooter that is mainly found in Southeast Asia Countries like Brunei, Burma (Myanmar), Cambodia, Timor-Leste, Indonesia, Laos, Malaysia, the Philippines, Singapore, Thailand and Vietnam. Actaully this kind of scooter-type motorcycle is 'well-known' in This Countriesand yea, I chose this scooter cuz its kinda famous in southeast asia countries and why not make it.

Addon.name: BMW R75
Addon.role: BMW R75, a motorcycle made by a Company called BMW. It was used by the military during WW2 as a means of transportation by military troops. Anyways this motorcycle was suppose to be a normal like city bike or town bike (there's a city bike version called the R75/5) but I change my mind while modeling the motorcycle and I made the BMW R75 the military version. This add-on comes in 3 variants.

Addon.name: Suzuki GS500
Addon.role: Suzuki GS500 I accidentally called it 'Suzuki GS5000' in the add-on and the link so I messed up real bad this time. The Suzuki GS500 is an entry level motorcycle manufactured and marketed by the Suzuki Motor Corporation.

The Honda EX5 Dream is also known as the Honda C100EX (1986 model) There we're more models like the C100,C102,C50,C70 and many more.

Anyways its launched in the year 2000 and there's many more models after this one > CRF-F but I picked the CRF-F series and you maybe wondering why? and here's the answer .. I just like this series of CRF. ;)

Addon.name: More Vehicles - Updated with Bus and Ambulance
Addon.role: Start your own taxi service, drive your friends around and charge them! Taxi not big enough? How about a bus? Race around in your own F1 racing car? Or an ice-cream truck business and a pizza truck business.

Addon.name: Yamaha XS1
Addon.role: The Yamaha XS-1 was a Air Cooled, Four Stroke, Parallel Twin Cylinder, SOHC, 2 Valves Per Cylinder Naked motorcycle produced by Yamaha in 1970. Max torque was 39.83 ft/lbs (54.0 Nm) @ 6800 RPM.

I got the ideas on the model from loginium mars motorcycle (addon) but this is a complete a different model and texture.

Addon.name: Utility Vehicles Pack
Addon.role: I don't wanna make this long, this addon is a collection of my previous utility vehicles that I've made, as well as new ones such as school buses, police cars and ambulances, with more to come in the future!

Addon.name: Tokyo Ravengers Addon
Addon.role: This addon is inspired by anime called Tokyo Ravengers where you will experience the world of gangster in Minecraft Bedrock Edition. Come and join the world of gangs and be the number one.

Addon.name: Custom Economy Sistem
Addon.role: BRING THE CAPITALISM TO YOUR WORLD, this addon let you create your own economy sistem using scoreboard compatible coins, debit cards, trader and even loot tables, perfect for realm , map makers or even juts a world with friends

Addon.name: Custom Currency! (Patch)
Addon.role: This pack adds custom money, and ways to get it. (This project was made using : Bridge_2.0 )Use this pack to make enhance your communities in Minecraft!(More about the pack below)

Addon.name: Floppa Mod
Addon.role: Hello! Have you ever searched the internet to find yourself a Floppa mod or addon for bedrock but just never found one? Well this addon is for you! This pack adds two adorable variations of the Floppa! (Cube Form LOL) And this pack also offers some new items!

Addon.name: Hard Mode Plus (New Items!)
Addon.role: This add-on makes every hostile mob(unless I missed some) even stronger, which includes health boots and damage and some have a slight height difference.

Addon.name: Elingo's Vending Machine Add-on [Snacks, Drinks and More]
Addon.role: This addon adds a vending machine, that will provide you with snacks, like soda cans, chips and chocolate bars. The snacks are random. You are not able to choose them. Let me know, which one you like the most. Enjoy!

Map.name: Idle Zombie Tycoon Map
Map.role: This map is an Idle Tycoon game! You earn money as an armor stand kills zombies and you can purchase upgrades with the money you earn! You can also use this money to gamble and earn even more profits.

Map.name: Starosia Life City Working RP
Map.role: Starosia Life is a city in which we can really play RP ( Like In Real Life ) thanks to its map and its different ways of making money .

Map.name: Mining Simulator
Map.role: Have you ever wanted a fun simulator from Roblox into Minecraft? I have thats why I made mining Simulator into Minecraft. Mining simulator is simulator game where you have to mine ores to progress.

Map.name: Yeet's Mining Sim V1.0.7
Map.role: The map is only in its starting point, but as I update it, the map gets better. If you wanna message me about the map, add me on discord; Jasper the Birdie#2685. Just incase you wanna know how something works, put yourself in creative and look at the command blocks. If you wanna make a youtube video on this map, go straight ahead, just don't claim the map as yours and send me your video.

Map.name: EnderPvP [Official Release]
Map.role: Don't have anything to do in Minecraft anymore and you want to play with your friends and want to test your skills at PvP? This map is just for you! Welcome to EnderPvP, my 3rd new map of the same name, EnderVG! The one that brought to you Ultimate Survival Base and the Nether Survival Base. This map is based on one of the most popular minigames of Minecraft, KitPvP!

Map.name: Mining Simulator Prison Edition
Map.role: Mining Simulator Always wanted to play Prison just with your friends? This is Mining Simulator map but with some Prison features. Like upgradeable pickaxes, 7 different mines, 14+ ore types, NPCs that can give you quests, Mining drills and much more. You can play this map alone or with as many friends as you want.

Map.name: Trash Collectors! #TeamSeas
Map.role: Help clean the ocean by collecting trash in Trash Collectors! A fun map to compete with friends and support MrBeast's and Mark Rober's #TeamSeas campaign! Collect trash, feed turtles and buy various powerups joined with MrBeast's outro song music in noteblocks!

Map.name: Godzilla Defense Force (Discontinued)

Every want to open a Christmas present before Christmas well in this game you did and a demon name MOTHER TATTLETALE spawned you know

Map.name: Custom Universal Park MCPE (Creation) v4 (Not Finished)
Map.role: Welcome to my custom version of universal with islands of adventure and universal studios combined into one park. There are plenty of fun attractions and rides! Have as much fun as you can and there will be more in the park as the world updates! This is a preview of the updated map due to multiple issues and bugs. This is NOT FINISHED.

Map.name: DiamonC’s 5 Slime Block Creations
Map.role: Ever wanted to fly a private jet to the nearest village? Perhaps you want to tame a dragon and rule the skies! Or maybe control a giant indestructible mech that destroys everything in its path! You can do all that in DiamonC’s 5 Slimestone Creations!

Map.name: Crazy Craft 1.0
Map.role: A Crazy Craft Recreation including Orespawn, JEI (resource pack), Inventory Pets, and more! This is the best Crazy Craft recreation available to bedrock players. I used as many recreations of the java mods as I could to make it as close as possible. ANY REDISTRIBUTION ON ANY OTHER WEBSITE IS NOT ALLOWED!

Map.name: Dauntless: The Dark Harvest (Discontinued)
Map.role: This is my dauntless world it features 7 swords (recipes down below) and 49 behemoths +1 my fan made one asharook a mix of lionfish and shark in the terra river it is terra and my own aether type water and this is kinda basted off the game Dauntless

Map.name: Py-Miner (Release, Update 0)
Map.role: You love mining, you love mining ores but you just can't find them in survival? In here, mine blocks as much as you like! Try to get more blocks to sell, and eventually work your way up to the last rank!

Map.name: Mining Simulator
Map.role: Hello, my name is Teafish. This map was made in a few weeks. And also, this is my first map submission in MCPEDL.com. So, I'm sorry if this map is bad.

Map.name: Insomnia Tower Defense V1.1 (3 NEW MAPS)
Map.role: Insomnia Tower defense is a story mode game where you battle over 50 waves of creatures using... Towers? Yes! You yourself can't do anything, but with a wide range of towers, 2 levels, four difficulties, 5 money settings, 5 advanced settings, over 20 total towers, and awesome maps, why wouldn't you want to play?

Map.name: Cookie Clicker Map!
Map.role: This map is based off the popular Cookie Clicker game! All you have to do is right click on item frames to earn cookies, buy buildings and see insane profits! This game is all about having more cookies than you can handle!

Map.name: Cake Factory
Map.role: Make cakes and earn cake money! In this game, you will become a worker in Minetown Cake Factory. To waiting for delivery to just watching workers make cakes. Play Cake Factory now!

Map.name: Tycoon 2.0
Map.role: Welcome to the premium version of tycoon 2.0, tycoon is back with a spooky event, Play and experience the Halloween event that's came with new upgrades, new themes and more!!

Map.name: Jessie101's Tutorial World! [Demo]
Map.role: Welcome to Jessie101's Tutorial World! In this world, there are x10 Command Block creations. As well as there being command block creations in this world, there is also a video on my YouTube channel called Jessie101, which explains all of the tutorials more in-depth.

Texture.name: Money
Texture.role: Have you ever wanted money in Minecraft? Maybe you want Money for currency? Well this Texture Pack is for you! This adds new money to the game that is very realistic!

Texture.name: Notch's Money Addon
Texture.role: Notch's Money is a new type of currency which is being introduced in the world of Minecraft.

Texture.name: Better Faction v1.0.14 (Translation Update Beta 1.0.22)
Texture.role: Better Faction is an add-on (script) for pvp faction server, it include some custom command in chat and allow to add home, warp, create faction and more. The pack Need to have Gametest Framework ON. (keep in mind it's in development) have fun.

Texture.name: Server Essentials
Texture.role: Setup a Bedrock Server in seconds! This addon will give you ALL of the tools needed to setup and build a server in seconds with ease including templates, security, staff tags, auto money and ranks, donation tiers, and so much more!

Texture.name: Land Claim + Chest Protection Addon for Multiplayer BEH
Texture.role: Ever wanted to protect your house from your co-players? Are they not trustworthy? Well this addon is made for you! Protect your house from griefers and stealers and play peacefully again. Especially made for MULTIPLAYER REALMS / SERVERS.

Texture.name: Land Claim + Chest Protection Addon for Multiplayer RES
Texture.role: Ever wanted to protect your house from your co-players? Are they not trustworthy? Well this addon is made for you! Protect your house from griefers and stealers and play peacefully again. Especially made for MULTIPLAYER REALMS / SERVERS.

Texture.name: M Structures Addon (Realms Support)
Texture.role: My first Addon, I will post the updates here. I will add thousands of commands. Any tips or opinions? Comment. Addon to facilitate some people to create maps, among other things.

Texture.name: Mobzilla Addon BEH
Texture.role: This addon adds Mobzilla (which is most likely an inspiration of Godzilla) to the game. It's a new type of boss which you can spawn in your world similar to spawning an iron golem and it provides an epic challenge for anyone who is brave enough to try. Once it is spawned there is no turning back and it's up to you to defeat this imminent threat to the Overworld.

Texture.name: Mobzilla Addon RES
Texture.role: This addon adds Mobzilla (which is most likely an inspiration of Godzilla) to the game. It's a new type of boss which you can spawn in your world similar to spawning an iron golem and it provides an epic challenge for anyone who is brave enough to try. Once it is spawned there is no turning back and it's up to you to defeat this imminent threat to the Overworld.

Texture.name: Elite Structures
Texture.role: Are you tired of having to build an entire city block by block in minecraft? do you wish you could spawn structures instantly? well wish no more! with this addon you can spawn over 500+ different unique structures all from a touch of a button! this addon has all kinds of structures ranging from medieval castles and western shops to suburban skyscrapers, this addon has it all.

Texture.name: Redstone Mechanic Addon
Texture.role: Redstone Mechanic is an add-on which replaces 25 vanilla mobs with awesome Redstone mobs! It also adds a whole bunch of new items such as underwater helmets and powerful weapons.

Texture.name: Cthulhu Addon BEH
Texture.role: Cthulhu is an ancient creature who is thought to live in the sea, maybe neighboring Godzilla. It's a giant monster which looks similar to an octopus except that it's obviously much bigger and also have wings and hands. It's been said for a long time that he would return and cause worldwide madness.. and that day is today! It's basically a boss addon which adds a new creature in-game.

Texture.name: Cthulhu Addon RES
Texture.role: Cthulhu is an ancient creature who is thought to live in the sea, maybe neighboring Godzilla. It's a giant monster which looks similar to an octopus except that it's obviously much bigger and also have wings and hands. It's been said for a long time that he would return and cause worldwide madness.. and that day is today! It's basically a boss addon which adds a new creature in-game.

Texture.name: GigaMobs Addon
Texture.role: GigaMobs will completely change your perspective of chickens, pigs and other animals which previously have been smaller than yourself. This addon will make them larger, stronger and also run faster. Some of them you can ride such as chickens and rabbits. Almost all mobs have had their size modified and this makes the world look kind of funny but also much more dangerous.

Texture.name: Money Transfer
Texture.role: I made a pack so you can easily transfer money.All you have to do is write !pay in the chat and let the UI open and indicate who you want to send the money to and how much.

Texture.name: Skyblock Shop Function Pack (Advanced Function Shop)
Texture.role: You making a Skyblock map and need a shop? We'll This is the Function Pack for you! This pack allows you to have a shop without command blocks! You can also use this function pack to make any shop, It is very advance and will work amazingly well and is 100% reliable! Plus it is extremely easy to use! This was originally made for my Skyblock map coming soon, but it was pretty advanced so I decided to share it with you guys!
